Name: Stela of Nefer-hotep
Description: The largest part of the stela is taken up by the representation. It shows the mummiform Osiris and the goddess Imentet being venerated by a man. The goddess can be identified as the goddess of the West thanks to her emblem, the sign of the west with feather and falcon. The man on the right is wearing a military kilt.Underneath the representation, the offering formula has been carved in two lines.
